item.title: Why you should open a $10,000 long-term CD this June
item.description: There's a strong argument to be made for opening a $10,000 long-term CD this June. Here's why it's worth doing now.

item.title: What to know about the Boulder, Colorado, attack and suspect in custody
item.description: A man is in custody for allegedly attacking people at a march in Boulder, Colorado, to support Israeli hostages still being held in Gaza.
